settings.heading: How does the Swiss Stage work?
settings.text: The Swiss Stage, also called a Swiss bracket, is commonly used in the RLCS and other high-level esports competitions. This is due to its thoroughness and nearly unrivaled ability to determine the best teams out of any given group. For these reasons, it will be what determines the Top 8 teams at the RLCS 2024 World Championship.

custom_css: @media (max-width: 768px) {.banner-item .img-box {transform: translateY(270px); } .content-box {padding: 0px; right: 0; transform: translate(0); height: 300px; min-height: 300px; }}

settings.image_banner_des: The World Championship takes place has two main phases. The tournament begins with the Swiss Stage, which lasts from Tuesday, September 10 through Friday, September 13. The Hybrid Elimination Bracket playoffs will then kick off on Saturday, September 14, and conclude with the crowning of a champion on Sunday, September 15. Exact schedules for each day will be announced at a later date.

settings.heading: ADJUSTABLE BACKREST
settings.text: Experience full-body support with a generous 168° recline. Ensure optimal comfort for your head, back, and shoulders. Suitable for gaming, working, or relaxing.

settings.heading: Adjustable 4D Armrests
settings.text: Experience smooth, precise adjustments in four directions with a refined mechanism. Raise the armrests to match your desk for perfect wrist and elbow support, or slide them under when you need to lean in and focus.

settings.image_banner_title: THE OFFICIAL GAMING CHAIR PARTNER OF RLCS
settings.image_banner_des: Dominate the battlefield with the Blacklyte Athena X Chair.

settings.heading: DESIGN
settings.text: The Athena chairs offer a perfect blend of stylish aesthetics and outstanding.
